GSP33yamgasau:0: ANALYTIC VERSION according to BHELA conventions:
GSP33yamgasau:8: nārāyaṇaḥ paraṃ brahma gītā-śāstre samīritaḥ || YGas_1 ||
GSP33yamgasau:14: pārthaṃ prapannam uddiśya śāstrā1vatraṇaṃ kṛtam || YGas_5 ||
GSP33yamgasau:18: sarve3śvare vā nyasyo7ktā tṛtīye karma-kāryatā || YGas_7 ||
GSP33yamgasau:20: bhedā jñānasya māhātmyam caturthā1dhyāya ucyate || YGas_8 ||
GSP33yamgasau:24: yoga-siddhaḥ sva-yogasya pāramyaṃ ṣaṣṭha ucyate || YGas_10 ||
GSP33yamgasau:26: bhakta-bhedaḥ prabuddhasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ saptama ucyate || YGas_11 ||
GSP33yamgasau:29: viśeṣo navame yogo bhakti-rūpaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || YGas_13 ||
GSP33yamgasau:32: dattam uktā vidi-prāptyor bhakty-eko1pāyatā tathā || YGas_15 ||
GSP33yamgasau:34: tat-prakārās tv atiprītir bhakte dvādaśa ucyate || YGas_16 ||
GSP33yamgasau:36: bandha-hetur vivekaś ca trayo-daśa udīryate || YGas_17 ||
GSP33yamgasau:40: vyāpānād bharaṇāt svāmyād anyaḥ pañca-daśo1ditaḥ || YGas_19 ||
GSP33yamgasau:43: aśāstram āsuraṃ kṛtsnam śāstrīyaṃ guṇataḥ pṛthak |
GSP33yamgasau:50: trayānām api yogānāṃ tribhir anyonya-saṃgamaḥ || YGas_24 ||
GSP33yamgasau:52: ātma-ṛṣṭes trayo 'py ete yoga-dvāreṇa sādhakāḥ || YGas_25 ||
GSP33yamgasau:53: pratilabhya parāṃ bhaktiṃ tayai9vā7vāpnoti tat-padam || YGas_26 ||
GSP33yamgasau:55: ātmā1rthī cet trayo 'py ete tat-kaivalyasya sādhakāḥ || YGas_27 ||
GSP33yamgasau:57: yāvat-prāpti parā1rthī cet tad evā7tyantam aśunute || YGas_28 ||
GSP33yamgasau:61: upāyatāṃ parityajya nyasyed deve tu tām abhīḥ || YGas_31 ||
GSP33yamgasau:63: tat-pradhānam idaṃ śāstram iti gītārthasaṃgrahaṃ || YGas_32 ||
